title: Available Ticket Count on the Event Tile match the number of tickets on the page
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron
And have ticket(s) to event(s)
When I am navigated to the Events Page
And I click the Invite People Button for an event
Then there will be a ticket count on the event tile for available tickets
And there will be tickets in the available tab
And the number of tickets in the available tab will be equal to the count on the event tile

title: Tickets that are non-forwardable do not have manual allocation buttons
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron
And have non-forwardable ticket(s) to event(s)
And I am navigated to the Events Page
And I click the Invite People button to navigate to the Events page
When I locate the Non-Forwardable Tickets
Then there will be no Manual Allocation button visible

title: All Buttons on the Available Tickets tab are showing as expected
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I am navigated to the Events Page
When I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
Then the refresh button is clickable
And the refresh button disables after a second
And the search button is clickable
And the the Multiple People button is clickable
And the Add Person button is clickable
And the Share tickets button is visible 
But the Share Tickets button is disabled
And the Manage List button is visible
But the ManageList button is disabled
And there are two tabs (Available Tickets & Shared Tickets) 
And I can toggle between them

title: Non-venue tickets are showing as expected
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with non-venue tickets
And I am navigated to the Events Page
When I click the Invite People Button
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
Then there is a section heading for "Other Tickets"
And there is no Row label or value
And parking tickets are listed without a seat number.

title: No Tickets message  when all the tickets have been shared
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with a fully shared event
And I am navigated to the Events Page
When I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
Then there will be a message reading "There are no available tickets. You can check ticket status in Shared Tickets"
And the Multiple People button is disabled
And the add Person button is disabled
And the share tickets button is disabled
And the Manage List is not visible

title: Buttons are disabled when all the tickets are allocated
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with an event with fully allocated tickets
And I am navigated to the Events Page
When I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
Then the Multiple People button is disabled
And the Add person button is disabled
And the Manage List button is enabled
And the Share button is enabled

title: TIcket Counts are visible for each bin (set of contiguous seats)
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I am navigated to the Events Page
When I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
Then there are ticket counts next to each bin
